content:
Grahame has done some work to add a search function to all IGs. The new searchform.html page uses DuckDuckGo to search all versions of the IG.

However, the CG IG versions published on hl7.org now have 2 search icons in the IG header, which is slightly confusing. One icon links to search.cfm and the other links to searchform.html.
http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/STU1/

I've asked Grahame if there is a straightforward way to remove the search.cfm icon/link from the published IG headers. Is this a change requiring further review?
Update: Grahame uploaded a fix for this.
